name: Wipe!
description:
Wipe!

Wipe! is a puzzle game where the main goal is to clean the area by getting rid of the cubes.

You are Wiper, a cleaner robot of the VertexTM Company who needs to clean every level using two tools:

  1.  TheV: shoots metal spheres and has six adjustable intensities to control with the mouse wheel.
  1. VAC: grabs the cubes in order to move them around. (you obtain VAC on level 9)

There are three different types of cubes:

  • Blue cube: Default cube that can pass through his field only
  • Green cube: Can pass through his field only
  • Stone cube:  Heavier than the other cubes and cannot pass through any field
Controls:
  • Walk: WASD
  • Sprint: Shift
  • Crouch: Ctrl
  • Shoot with TheV: LMB
  • Vacuum Cubes with VAC: RMB
  • Change TheV's intensity: ScrollWheel
  • TheV: 1
  • VAC: 2
